short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write, Summarize and Analyze documents and text using My AI Assistant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MyAI Assistant is the only AI extension you need to boost your productivity. It enables you to summarize and explain text, create mind maps, and improve the quality of your writing with a single click. Just right-click to perform the action you want.

Best of all, it's free! Try it now and discover how MyAI Assistant can make your daily tasks more efficient.

Features:
1. Summarize - Get a quick summary of any text. MyAI will summarize the content so you don't have to read everything.
2. Summarize in 30 Words or Less - Summarize text on steroids! Get any text summarized in fewer than 30 words, perfect for long articles.
3. Explain in Simple Words - Have any text explained in plain language. Ideal for understanding technical articles with complex jargon.
4. Improve Text - Instantly enhance your writing. Perfect for quickly refining something you've already written.
5. Make Text Professional - Transform your writing to sound more professional. Ideal for giving your text a polished, professional tone.
6. Create a Mind Map - Generate a mind map to help you better understand the text. Great for breaking down complex topics or lengthy articles.
Use it for free now!
